nodes.text: Vagabond was a starship in the service of the Galactic Republic Navy during the Clone Wars. In 21 BBY, the ship was destroyed during the Battle of Cavamina Minor by a fleet of the Separatist Navy. The battle of Cavamina Minor was a trap set by Attuma Duum for his personal enjoyment and to increase war profits by prolonging the war. Both fleets eventually withdrew after suffering casualties.

Vagabond appears in The Clone Wars: Deadly Hands of Shon-Ju. The scene in which the Vagabond is mentioned includes an Acclamator-class assault ship and a Venator-class Star Destroyer, both of which are heavily damaged; the text does not specify which one is the Vagabond.
